parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of tokens purchased.

parameterDecorators.name: purchaser
parameterDecorators.description: who paid for the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: weis paid for purchase.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of tokens purchased.

parameterDecorators.name: purchaser
parameterDecorators.description: who paid for the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: weis paid for purchase.

functionDecorators.name: approve
functionDecorators.description: Grant another address the right to transfer token via takeOwnership() and transferFrom(). Required for ERC-721 compliance.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The address to be granted transfer approval. Pass address(0) to clear all approvals.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the Token that can be transferred if this call succeeds.

functionDecorators.name: transferFrom
functionDecorators.description: Third-party initiates transfer of token from address _from to address _to. Required for ERC-721 compliance.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: The address for the token to be transferred from.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The address for the token to be transferred to.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the Token that can be transferred if this call succeeds.

functionDecorators.name: setCEO
functionDecorators.description: Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.

parameterDecorators.name: _newCEO
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new CEO.

functionDecorators.name: setCOO
functionDecorators.description: Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current COO.

parameterDecorators.name: _newCOO
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new COO.

functionDecorators.name: ownerOf
functionDecorators.description: For querying owner of token. Required for ERC-721 compliance.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: The tokenID for owner inquiry.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: For querying balance of a particular account. Required for ERC-721 compliance.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: The address for balance query.

functionDecorators.name: tokensOfOwner
functionDecorators.description: This method MUST NEVER be called by smart contract code. First, it's fairly expensive (it walks the entire tokens array looking for tokens belonging to owner), but it also returns a dynamic array, which is only supported for web3 calls, and not contract-to-contract calls.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: The owner whose celebrity tokens we are interested in.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Owner initates the transfer of the token to another account. Required for ERC-721 compliance.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The address for the token to be transferred to.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the Token that can be transferred if this call succeeds.

functionDecorators.name: createPromoCollectible
functionDecorators.description: Creates a new promo collectible with the given name, with given _price and assignes it to an address.

functionDecorators.name: takeOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allow pre-approved user to take ownership of a token. Required for ERC-721 compliance.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the Token that can be transferred if this call succeeds.

functionDecorators.name: getToken
functionDecorators.description: Returns all the relevant information about a specific collectible.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: The tokenId of the collectible of interest.
